  • 4.28. umbra.globals.uiConstants

4.28. umbra.globals.uiConstants¶

uiConstants.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Defines Umbra package ui constants through the UiConstants class.

Others:

4.28.1. Classes¶

class umbra.globals.uiConstants.UiConstants[source]¶

Defines Umbra package ui constants.
